channel.description: Enable or disable the adding of members when channel/category permission are changed.
channel.name: on-channel-update

disable.description: Enable or disable all events to switch the bot to manual or automatic mode
disable.name: manual-mode
disable.option: Enable or disable the manual mode

main.description: Edit the server configuration. Allow to disable / enable some events
main.name: config

member.description: Enable or disable the thread update on member permission modifications
member.name: on-member-update

newMember.description: Enable or disable the adding of members when they join the server.
newMember.name: on-new-member

thread.description: Enable or disable the adding of members when thread are created.
thread.name: on-thread-created

updateAllThreads.description: Update all threads with adding missing users
updateAllThreads.name: update-all-threads

updateSpecificThread.description: Update a specific thread with adding missing users
updateSpecificThread.error: This command can only be used in a thread
updateSpecificThread.name: update-specific-thread

updateThread.description: Update this thread with adding missing users
updateThread.error: This command can only be used in a thread
updateThread.name: update-thread
